Sassy Old Grandma ... Put on your specs. It's a goat. They don't like belly rubs. However, if you feed it a bottle then cup it's muzzle in your hand (clean, of course) and gently rub the sides of the mouth, goat will get drowsy and go to sleep. I did that with my baby goat and it worked the rest of the her life. She was so smart that she knew words. I'd ask her if she wanted a nose rub and she'd stick her nose into my hand. She'd shake hands, lay down and unwrap herself when she looped the tree and shortened the rope. She had full horns and liked to use them.
She sounds so sweet. Ok, belly rubs are out, nose rubs are in. I've never had a goat so it will be a learning experience. :)
